name: Windmill (Ellie Bee)
description:
This is a first person puzzling solving adventure. Explore the windmill and uncover the secrets beneath. 

This game was made for the Finally Finish Something 2022 Game Jam! 

Play time is ~20 minutes. 

It's my first game. :) 

All 3D models made by me. 

Windmill song by me.

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Sound Effect - Summer Birds

Audio And Video Recorded By Sonny Fascia

Audio From: https://edinburghrecords.com
